creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: reprint: cartoonish sketches of groups of people engaging in various raucous activities (e.g. board games, physical competition, cock fighting, dog fighting); and of animals such as frogs, monkeys, horses, deer, and rabbits engaging in humanlike activities: walking in geta, carrying instruments, driving a cart, dancing, etc.
marks:
Title, Inscriptions, Seals, and Label

Inscripti when rolled, title adhered to top
title: Cartoons of Animals and Humans, Vol. 3
